snippet: The Hawkeyes, coming off a win over No. 1 Michigan State, rallied from a 17-point halftime deficit to hand the Boilermakers their first home loss of the season.
abstract: College Basketball Roundup; Iowa defeats Purdue, 70-63, in men's college basketball; other men's and women's scores noted.
lead_paragraph: The Hawkeyes, coming off a win over No. 1 Michigan State, rallied from a 17-point halftime deficit to hand the Boilermakers their first home loss of the season.

headline.main: Iowa Earns Second Straight Victory Over a Top-15 Team, Toppling Purdue
headline.print_headline: Iowa Earns a Second Straight Victory Over a Top-15 Team, Toppling Purdue
